M1 Network Features
M1 Introduction

M1N Network is a decentralized networked metaverse rendering platform based on blockchain technology, 3D asset rendering technology, and edge container scheduling technology. It focuses on serving the game tribes and virtual people in the metaverse. By building a decentralized cloud rendering platform to serve the rendering of the three-dimensional assets of the metaverse, â€‹it solves the problem of the underlying rendering resources and the problem of the virtual character UGC in the development of the metaverse, and promotes the deployment and development of metaverse application, builds a decentralized infrastructure for the metaverse.
